title: No midday meal for students, but all is well in the official inspection reports
article_body: In the sort of desi irony we’ve come to appreciate, the case of the missing midday meals at the primary school in a village in the district of Lalitpur seemed just ripe, post the Prime Minister’s Independence Day speech, which had several BJP Chief Ministers claiming midday meal victories across their respective states.
description: In the sort of desi irony we’ve come to appreciate, the case of the missing midday meals at the primary school in a village in the district of Lalitpur seemed just ripe, post the Prime Minister’s Independence Day speech, which had several BJP Chief Ministers claiming midday meal victories across their respective states.
